title: Honoring Health Quest upon the occasion of its designation as recipient of the Community Spirit Award
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  honoring  Health Quest upon the occasion of its
designation as recipient of the Community Spirit Award by  the  Dutchess
County Regional Chamber of Commerce

WHEREAS, Organizations which give of their time and energy and serve the
best interests of their communities are an asset beyond remuneration and
cannot be sufficiently extolled; and
  WHEREAS,  Health  Quest  has given not only of its time and energy but
also of its competence, intelligence and leadership and consequently has
been designated for special honor; and
  WHEREAS, This Legislative Body is justly proud to honor  Health  Quest
upon the occasion of its designation as recipient of the Community Spir-
it  Award  by  the  Dutchess  County Regional Chamber of Commerce, to be
celebrated on February 5, 2011; and
  WHEREAS, This fine event is the Chamber's Le Cirque Des Affaires Annu-
al Gala which will be held at The Grandview in Poughkeepsie,  New  York;
and
  WHEREAS,  Health  Quest  is the Mid-Hudson Valley's largest healthcare
system, providing the highest quality care across a  broad  spectrum  of
services;  offering  the  full  range of hospital services, pre-hospital
emergency care, homecare and nursing home care,  Health  Quest  provides
immediate  and  caring  service  to the one million people who reside in
Columbia, Dutchess, Ulster,  Orange,  Putnam  and  northern  Westchester
counties; and
  WHEREAS,  Health  Quest's  three  hospital  partners  include Northern
Dutchess Hospital in Rhinebeck, Putnam Hospital  Center  in  Carmel  and
Vassar  Brothers Medical Center in Poughkeepsie, as well as a multi-spe-
cialty physician group, Health Quest Medical Practice; and
  WHEREAS, Health Quest contributes sponsorship and underwriting to over
two dozen non-profit organizations each year; it is proud to be a  major
sponsor  for both The American Heart Association and The American Cancer
Society; and
  WHEREAS,  Health  Quest  also  proudly  supports  community  education
through   several  events,  including  two  women's  events  exclusively
designed to educate women about their unique  health  care  needs;  each
hospital  provides support and assistance to thousands of residents each
year in the area of health education, screenings, community lectures and
disease management support; and
  WHEREAS, Throughout the entire period  of  its  community  service,  a
period  of  constructive involvement, Health Quest has stood constant in
dignity, good grace and humor; and
  WHEREAS, Rare indeed is the impressive dedication shown  by  organiza-
tions  for  the  benefit  of  others  which  Health  Quest has displayed
throughout its existence; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
honor  Health Quest upon the occasion of its designation as recipient of
the Community Spirit Award by the Dutchess County  Regional  Chamber  of
Commerce; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Health Quest.
